title: Duck-tective
description: When a case is particularly hard to crack, the Constable calls on Duck-tective.
altHero: a duck with a detective hat sits at a desk with a pile of papers
alt2: the Constable and Duck-tective with a criminal tied up
alt3: Duck-tective, on oxygen in a hospital bed, sees a duck-shaped sillouhette in the doorway
alt4: the Constable, Duck-tective, and penguin find a dead body in the river
